mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rnum, a.*, (select count(*) from discussion_reply where b_serialno = #{b_serialno} and r_level = 0) totalReplyCount from ( select * from discussion_reply where b_serialno = #{b_serialno} and r_level= 0 and r_checkeddel = 0 order by r_no desc) a) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select count(*) from discussion_reply where b_serialno = #{b_serialno} and r_checkeddel = 0
mapper.insert: insert into discussion_reply(b_serialno, r_no, r_writer, u_email , r_content ,r_yesorno) values (#{b_serialno}, seq_discussion_reply.nextval, #{r_writer}, #{u_email}, #{r_content}, #{r_yesOrNo})
insert into discussion_reply_likeInfo (u_email, r_no, r_likenum) values (#{u_email},#{r_no},#{r_likenum})
mapper.update: update discussion_reply set r_upcount = (select count(*) from discussion_reply_likeinfo where r_no =#{r_no} and r_likenum =1), r_downcount = (select count(*) from discussion_reply_likeinfo where r_no =#{r_no} and r_likenum =2) where r_no = #{r_no}
mapper.insert: insert into discussion_reply(b_serialno, r_no, r_writer, r_content, u_email, r_level, r_coment_no) values (#{b_serialno},#{r_no},#{r_writer},#{r_content},#{u_email}, 1, seq_discussion_coment.nextval)
mapper.select: select * from discussion_reply where r_no = #{r_no} and r_level = 1 order by r_coment_no
